item.title: Flat Rate vs Pay As You Go Conference Calling
item.description:
You’ve already seen how conference calls and web conferencing can save your company a lot of money. So why worry about the small costs involved? Firstly, saving money is always a good thing. Secondly, the more affordable conference calls are, the more you can use them to boost productivity. Let’s examine AccuConference, a leading teleconferencing provider, and see their pricing options. AccuConference offers both flat rate and pay-as-you-go conference calls...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/flat-rate-vs-pay-as-you-go-conference-calling/
